---
Analyze Google's AI-generated responses on search results. Input unlimited keywords, run searches, and get detailed reports on AI Overview presence, keyword lengths, cited links, and top domains. You can also search specific domains to see their AI Overview keywords. All data is downloadable in an Excel sheet for comprehensive analysis.

Main Features:
â€¢ Check for AI Overview presence on SERPs with unlimited keywords.
â€¢ Get reports showing the percentage of keywords with AI Overview.
â€¢ Analyze keyword lengths and their impact with a pie chart.
â€¢ View cited links and most referenced domains for AI Overview keywords.
â€¢ Search specific domains to see which keywords trigger AI Overview.
â€¢ Download all reports in a comprehensive Excel sheet with multiple tabs.
â€¢ Background search functionality lets you multitask while the extension works.

Why You'll Love It:

â€¢ Gain insights into Google's AI-generated responses on SERPs.
â€¢ Save time with automated searches and detailed reports.
â€¢ Enhance your SEO strategy with data-driven analysis and visuals.
